#sight #mig21

YF-23 Sight for M46 Patton

Hi everybody, I just made a sight by myself. I used WTDraw to do it. The sight is a lil bit annoying, because the lines on the bottom of the sight are soo annoying during the battle, so I only recommend the download if you use the sight on your own risk!
By the way, this is my first ever sight, so please forgive me for everything!

Thanks for downloading,
ImGerey

Murder drones J sight! (i aint doing another gooner sight in my life) #murderdrones #jmurderdrones #sight #alltanks

Ellen Joe from Zenless Zone Zero

original creator @Meuhzile
link: https://live.warthunder.com/profile/persistent/LjSquANPkb/

I just removed the extra lines and changed the regular crosshairs to a convenient dot

HOW TO INSTALL
extracted files from zip and paste it to UserSights > all_tanks in local files game (make one if you dont have)
IN GAME
go to options > Ground vehicle battle settings > sight settings > on line "Reticle", click on first box and choose the usersight you just downloaded and remember to save before leave

if sight doesn't ap...

Оцениваем. Лайкаем. Скачиваем!

  • Для каждого танка подбирайте размер картинки под себя (размеров 6 штучек).

#anime #sight #alltanks #vtuber #fubar #military

First time posting something into WT Live... and it's my first attempt at making custom sight

of course it would be gooner sight, yes I got freaky, I'm not even sugarcoating or denying that :3c

Anyway character is Ran Yakumo (or Yakumo Ran if you preferred JaPaNeSe NaMiNg AuThEnIcItY) from the bullet hell game series Touhou Project. All property right belong to Team Shanghai Alice, the creator(which only comprise of ZUN lol) of Touhou Project, and the Artist of the original drawing.

Contain 4 Versions, all for the sake of seeing the fox mommy clearer, or more practical approach...
